IRS990.MissionDesc: OKLAHOMA ZOOLOGICAL SOCIETY CONNECTS THE COMMUNITY WITH THE OKC ZOO TO INSPIRE CONSERVATION ACTION THROUGH PHILANTHROPY.
IRS990.Desc: THE PRIMARY PURPOSE OF THE OKLAHOMA ZOOLOGICAL SOCIETY IS TO SUPPORT THE OKLAHOMACITY ZOOLOGICAL PARK AND ITS PROGRAMS OF EDUCATION, RECREATION, CONSERVATION ANDRESEARCH. ALL OF THE PROGRAM FUNDS RAISED GO DIRECTLY TO SUPPORT EXHIBITS, ANIMALCARE, EDUCATION PROGRAMS, CONSERVATION PROGRAMS, ZOO ENHANCEMENTS, AND ZOO FUND FORKIDS. EACH YEAR THE OKLAHOMA ZOOLOGICAL SOCIETY FUNDS SPECIAL PROJECTS AND PROGRAMSFOR THE ZOO SUCH AS EXPEDITION AFRICA, VETERINARY EQUIPMENT, SCULPTURES, IMPROVEMENTS TO ANIMAL HABITATS, EXTRA FUNDS FOR ANIMAL CARE, BENCHES FOR THE PARK, FUNDING FOR THE ZOO'S CONSERVATION PROJECTS AND NEW MATERIALS FOR THEEDUCATION DEPARTMENT.

OtherAssetsOrgGrp.Desc: BENEFICIAL INT IN ASSETS HELD BY OTHERS

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part XI, Line 2d: Other revenue amounts included in F/S but not included on form 990
Part XII, Line 2d: Other expenses and losses per audited F/S

RecipientTable.NonCashAssistanceDesc: EXPENSES PAID ON BEHALF OF TRUST

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PART I, LINE 2:GRANTEE ORGANIZATIONS WILL REPORT INFORMATION ON THE USE OF THE GRANT ANNUALLY OR SEMI-ANNUALLY BACK TO THE FUNDING ORGANIZATION, THE OKLAHOMA ZOOLOGICAL SOCIETY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ONCE A DRAFT COPY OF THE FORM 990 IS RECEIVED, THE FINANCE COMMITTEE WILL REVIEW THE DOCUMENT. WHEN APPROVAL IS REACHED, THE FORM 990 WILL BE GIVEN TO THE ENTIRE BOARD FOR REVIEW WITH A RECOMMENDATION FROM THE FINANCE COMMITTEE THAT IT BE APPROVED. AFTER AN APPROVAL VOTE OF THE ENTIRE BOARD IS REACHED. THE FORM 990 WILL BE FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL BOARD MEMBERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORM ANNUALLY WHICH DISCLOSES ANY INTEREST THAT COULD GIVE RISE TO CONFLICTS. THE POLICY IS MONITORED AND ENFORCED FOR COMPLIANCE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15a
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND HUMAN RESOURCES MEETS TO DISCUSS NATIONAL AVERAGES AND PERFORMANCE AND THEN MEETS WITH THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR FOR ANNUAL REVIEW.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS DISCLOSURE EXPLANATION UPON REQUEST.
